content.text: Not much, just finished reading a book about a woman who lived in Thailand for a year.
Oh cool! I've always wanted to go to Thailand. Have you been?
Yes, I went a couple years ago and it was amazing! I loved the floating markets.
That sounds so cool! I'm glad you had a great time.
Thanks! I'm a big fan of Jane Austen, so I'm sure you'll like the book.
That's awesome! I love Pride and Prejudice! It's one of my favorite books.
Me too! It's so well written and the characters are so well developed.
Yeah, it's a classic for a reason.
I'm glad you agree! What's your favorite book?
It's hard to choose just one, but I'd say my favorite book is probably The Lord of the Rings.
Oh, I love that series! I've read it so many times.
I'm glad you like it! I love talking to people about books.
Me too! It's so much fun to share your love of reading with others.
I agree! I'm glad we met.
